gradle/org.gradle.tooling.model.eclipse/EclipseRuntime

EclipseRuntime

interface EclipseRuntime(source)

Information about the eclipse instance. This is a possible parameter for the EclipseProject model resolution. It provides additional information to gradle so it can build a more accurate EclipseProject model.

Since

5.5
